tag.name: carousel
tag.example: <html:carousel> <html:carousel-item active="true" label="Item 1" description="Description 1"> <html:carousel-image url="https://jslsolucoes.com/wp-content/uploads/logo.png" width="200" height="200" alt="logo"/> </html:carousel-item> <html:carousel-item label="Item 2" description="Description 2"> <html:carousel-image url="https://jslsolucoes.com/wp-content/uploads/logo.png" width="200" height="200" alt="logo"/> </html:carousel-item> </html:carousel>

tag.name: carousel-item

attribute.description: Indicates the label of carousel item
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n) of carousel item
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the description of carousel item
attribute.name: description

attribute.description: Indicates the description key (i18n) of carousel item
attribute.name: descriptionKey

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component must start activated. Default: false. Options: true,false
attribute.name: active

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example: <html:carousel> <html:carousel-item active="true" label="Item 1" description="Description 1"> <html:carousel-image url="https://jslsolucoes.com/wp-content/uploads/logo.png" width="200" height="200" alt="logo"/> </html:carousel-item> <html:carousel-item label="Item 2" description="Description 2"> <html:carousel-image url="https://jslsolucoes.com/wp-content/uploads/logo.png" width="200" height="200" alt="logo"/> </html:carousel-item> </html:carousel>

tag.name: carousel-image

attribute.description: It indicates if the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates the alt of image
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: It indicates the alt key (i18n) of image
attribute.name: altKey

attribute.description: It indicates if the component must be loaded from cdn
attribute.name: cdn

tag.example: <html:carousel> <html:carousel-item active="true" label="Item 1" description="Description 1"> <html:carousel-image url="https://jslsolucoes.com/wp-content/uploads/logo.png" width="200" height="200" alt="logo"/> </html:carousel-item> <html:carousel-item label="Item 2" description="Description 2"> <html:carousel-image url="https://jslsolucoes.com/wp-content/uploads/logo.png" width="200" height="200" alt="logo"/> </html:carousel-item> </html:carousel>
